page.title: 13MY GRANDMOTHER
page.content: MY GRANDMOTHER WAS BORN ON THE{23rd {JANUARY 1897.}SHE LIVED IN FRAGGLEY. SHE HAD TO WALK FIVE MILES TO SCHOOL AND FIVE MILES BACK HOME EACH DAY ALONG THE CANAL,THE TOEPATHS AND FOOTPATHS. HER DAD MADE CANAL LOCHS SO SHE SPENT A LOT OF TIME BY THE CANAL. SHE GOT A JOB IN A PUBLIC SCHOOL AS A COOK, WHERE SHE MET THE GARDENER, WHO SHE LATER MARRIED AND MOVED TO RECTORY ROAD IN AN EDWARDIAN TERRACE HOUSE. SHE HAD A PASSION TO PLAY THE PIANO SO SHE TOOK A WHOLE WEEKS WAGES AND BOUGHT A SECOND-HAND ONE. SHE NOW LIVES ALONE DOING ALL HER OWN SHOPPING AND DECORATING. ALTHOUGH SHE HAS ARTHRITIS SHE STILL PLAYS HER PIANO. ONLY ONCE IN THE PAST SIX YEARS HAS SHE LEFT HER HOUSE THROUGH ILL HEALTH, JUST AFTER HER ELDER BROTHER DIED. SHE STAYED WITH HER SON FOR A WEEK.
